verses.verse: But in the last <WH319> days <WH3117> it shall come to pass, that the mountain <WH2022> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068> shall be established <WH3559> <WH8737> in the top <WH7218> of the mountains <WH2022>, and it shall be exalted <WH5375> <WH8737> above the hills <WH1389>; and people <WH5971> shall flow <WH5102> <WH8804> unto it.

And many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> shall come <WH1980> <WH8804>, and say <WH559> <WH8804>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us go up <WH5927> <WH8799> to the mountain <WH2022> of the YY <WH3068>, and to the house <WH1004> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290>; and he will teach <WH3384> <WH8686> us of his ways <WH1870>, and we will walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in his paths <WH734>: for the Torah <WH8451> shall go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> of TZiyon <WH6726>, and the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> from Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And he shall judge <WH8199> <WH8804> among many <WH7227> people <WH5971>, and rebuke <WH3198> <WH8689> strong <WH6099> nations <WH1471> afar off <WH7350>; and they shall beat <WH3807> <WH8765> their swords <WH2719> into plowshares <WH855>, and their spears <WH2595> into pruninghooks <WH4211>: nation <WH1471> shall not lift up <WH5375> <WH8799> a sword <WH2719> against nation <WH1471>, neither shall they learn <WH3925> <WH8799> war <WH4421> any more.

But they shall sit <WH3427> <WH8804> every man <WH376> under his vine <WH1612> and under his fig tree <WH8384>; and none shall make them afraid <WH2729> <WH8688>: for the mouth <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> it.

For all people <WH5971> will walk <WH3212> <WH8799> every one <WH376> in the name <WH8034> of his god <WH430>, and we will walk <WH3212> <WH8799> in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.

In that day <WH3117>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH3068>, will I assemble <WH622> <WH8799> her that halteth <WH6760> <WH8802>, and I will gather <WH6908> <WH8762> her that is driven out <WH5080> <WH8737>, and her that I have afflicted <WH7489> <WH8689>;

And I will make <WH7760> <WH8804> her that halted <WH6760> <WH8802> a remnant <WH7611>, and her that was cast far off <WH1972> <WH8737> a strong <WH6099> nation <WH1471>: and the YY <WH3068> shall reign <WH4427> <WH8804> over them in mount <WH2022> TZiyon <WH6726> from henceforth, even for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.

And thou, O tower <WH4026> of the flock <WH5739> <WH8677> <WH4029>, the strong hold <WH6076> of the daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>, unto thee shall it come <WH857> <WH8799>, even the first <WH7223> dominion <WH4475>; the kingdom <WH4467> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> to the daughter <WH1323> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

Now why dost thou cry <WH7321> <WH8686> out aloud <WH7452>? is there no king <WH4428> in thee? is thy counsellor <WH3289> <WH8802> perished <WH6> <WH8804>? for pangs <WH2427> have taken <WH2388> <WH8689> thee as a woman in travail <WH3205> <WH8802>.

Be in pain <WH2342> <WH8798>, and labour to bring forth <WH1518> <WH8798>, O daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>, like a woman in travail <WH3205> <WH8802>: for now shalt thou go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> out of the city <WH7151>, and thou shalt dwell <WH7931> <WH8804> in the field <WH7704>, and thou shalt go <WH935> <WH8804> even to Babylon <WH894>; there shalt thou be delivered <WH5337> <WH8735>; there the YY <WH3068> shall redeem <WH1350> <WH8799> thee from the hand <WH3709> of thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>.

Now also many <WH7227> nations <WH1471> are gathered <WH622> <WH8738> against thee, that say <WH559> <WH8802>, Let her be defiled <WH2610> <WH8799>, and let our eye <WH5869> look <WH2372> <WH8799> upon TZiyon <WH6726>.

But they know <WH3045> <WH8804> not the thoughts <WH4284> of the YY <WH3068>, neither understand <WH995> <WH8689> they his counsel <WH6098>: for he shall gather <WH6908> <WH8765> them as the sheaves <WH5995> into the floor <WH1637>.

Arise <WH6965> <WH8798> and thresh <WH1758> <WH8798>, O daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>: for I will make <WH7760> <WH8799> thine shofar <WH7161> iron <WH1270>, and I will make <WH7760> <WH8799> thy hoofs <WH6541> brass <WH5154>: and thou shalt beat in pieces <WH1854> <WH8689> many <WH7227> people <WH5971>: and I will consecrate <WH2763> <WH8689> their gain <WH1215> unto the YY <WH3068>, and their substance <WH2428> unto the YY <WH113> of the whole earth <WH776>.
